description.translate: Properly maintained equipment is the true value of the warrior.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Garde impeccable\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Un équipement entretenu fait\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la véritable valeur du guerrier.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Properly maintained equipment is\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the true value of the warrior.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1\"}"]}}
